channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Capital One Travel portal: What to know about redeeming your miles for flights, hotels and more

item.title: 7 reasons to get the Capital One Venture Rewards card

item.title: Book now: Winter business-class award availability to Switzerland starting at 56K miles
